widgets.onValue:
// send the value to the fader too - faderDummy is used to avoid processing of feedback
send('/fader', {type: 'i', value: getProp(id, 'preArgs')}, {type: 'f', value: value});

// send the value to the fader too - faderDummy is used to avoid processing of feedback
send('/fader', {type: 'i', value: getProp(id, 'preArgs')}, {type: 'f', value: value});

// send the value to the fader too - faderDummy is used to avoid processing of feedback
send('/fader', {type: 'i', value: getProp(id, 'preArgs')}, {type: 'f', value: value});

// send the value to the fader too - faderDummy is used to avoid processing of feedback
send('/fader', {type: 'i', value: getProp(id, 'preArgs')}, {type: 'f', value: value});

// send the value to the fader too - faderDummy is used to avoid processing of feedback
send('/fader', {type: 'i', value: getProp(id, 'preArgs')}, {type: 'f', value: value});

// send the value to the fader too - faderDummy is used to avoid processing of feedback
send('/fader', {type: 'i', value: getProp(id, 'preArgs')}, {type: 'f', value: value});
